    • compare

      public static boolean compare​(java.lang.Object lhs, java.lang.Object rhs, java.lang.String operator)
      Compare two objects. lhs and rhs must be of the same type (Number, Boolean, String or Code) Numbers are converted to double prior to comparison. Supported operators are: <, <=, ==, >=, >, !=, is nil, is not nil. Only lhs is checked for is nil and is not nil.

    • compare

      public static boolean compare​(java.lang.Double lhs, java.lang.Double rhs, java.lang.String operator)
      Compare two Doubles. Supported operators are: <, <=, ==, >=, >, !=, is nil, is not nil. Only lhs is checked for is nil and is not nil.

    • compare

      public static boolean compare​(java.lang.Boolean lhs, java.lang.Boolean rhs, java.lang.String operator)
      Compare two Booleans. Supported operators are: <, <=, ==, >=, >, !=, is nil, is not nil. Only lhs is checked for is nil and is not nil.

    • compare

      public static boolean compare​(java.lang.String lhs, java.lang.String rhs, java.lang.String operator)
      Compare two Strings. Supported operators are: <, <=, ==, >=, >, !=, is nil, is not nil. Only lhs is checked for is nil and is not nil.

    • compare

      public static boolean compare​(java.lang.Integer lhs, java.lang.Integer rhs, java.lang.String operator)
      Compare two Integers. Supported operators are: <, <=, ==, >=, >, !=, is nil, is not nil. Only lhs is checked for is nil and is not nil.

    • compare

      public static boolean compare​(HealthRecord.Code lhs, HealthRecord.Code rhs, java.lang.String operator)
      Compare two Codes. Supported operators are: !=, is nil, is not nil. Only lhs is checked for is nil and is not nil.

    • readResource

      public static final java.lang.String readResource​(java.lang.String filename) throws java.io.IOException
      Read the entire contents of a file in resources into a String.
      Parameters:
      filename - Path to the file, relative to src/main/resources.
      Returns:
      The entire text contents of the file.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if any error occurs reading the file

    • getGson

      public static com.google.gson.Gson getGson()
      Get a Gson object, preconfigured to load the GMF modules into classes.
      Returns:
      Gson object to unmarshal GMF JSON into objects

    • randomDicomUid

      public static java.lang.String randomDicomUid​(RandomNumberGenerator random, long time, int seriesNo, int instanceNo)
      Generate a random DICOM UID to uniquely identify an ImagingStudy, Series, or Instance. Optionally add series and/or instance numbers to the UID to enhance its uniqueness. Pass 0 for the series/instance number to omit it from the UID.
      Returns:
      a String DICOM UID

    • strToObject

      public static java.lang.Object strToObject​(java.lang.Class<?> clazz, java.lang.String value)
      Utility function to convert from string to a base Java object type.
      Parameters:
      clazz - type to convert to
      value - string value to convert
      Returns:
      converted value

    • walkAllModules

      public static void walkAllModules​(java.util.function.BiConsumer<java.nio.file.Path,​java.nio.file.Path> action) throws java.lang.Exception
      Walk the directory structure of the modules, and apply the given function for every module.
      Parameters:
      action - Action to apply for every module. Function signature is (topLevelModulesFolderPath, currentModulePath) -> {...}
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception

    • walkAllModules
